title: Johan de Aguas
text:
I am currently pursuing my PhD in the Faculty of Mathematics and Natural Sciences (MatNat) at the University of Oslo (UiO), under the supervision of Dr. Johan Pensar. Additionally, I hold a research position at the Norwegian Institute of Public Health (NIPH), supervised by Dr. Guido Biele.
I hold undergraduate degrees in industrial engineering and economics from Universidad de los Andes (UniAndes) in Colombia. Additionally, I have master’s degrees in economics and statistics. I earned the latter at Michigan State University (MSU) as an international Fulbright scholar.
I have prior experience working as a research consultant and lead data scientist, contributing to projects involving impact evaluation, regional competitiveness, international trade, mobile banking, and alternative credit scoring.

title: Johan de Aguas
text:
Research
My research interests and experience revolve around:

Graphical and nonparametric approaches to causal inference
Uncertainty quantification for inference and prediction
Application of econometrics and game theory to network interactions and peer effects

title: Johan de Aguas
text:
Career

2021 - Now: Researcher at the Norwegian Institute of Public Health (NIPH)
2020 - 2021: Consultant (promoted from Summer Intern) at the Inter-American Development Bank (IADB)
2018 - 2019: Lead Data Scientist (promoted from Data Scientist) at Tpaga (startup)
2014 - 2017: Research Consultant at the Economic Commission for Latin America and the Caribbean (ECLAC)

title: Johan de Aguas
text:
Scholarships and grants

2023: Germany exchange program — Norwegian Artificial Intelligence Research Consortium - NORA
2019 - 2021: International Fulbright scholar program — United States Department of State
2015-2018: High-level human capital training program for the regions — Ministry of Science, Technology and Innovation of Colombia
2008-2012: Quiero Estudiar scholarship program — Universidad de los Andes
